title: Peppermint magazine
content:
I’m curious about this font. Please help ID? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100106060523im_/http:/typophile.com/files/peppr_5989.jpg)
author: rizsedek

comments.content:
I think it’s the heavy weight of [ITC Souvenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20100106060523/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-souvenir/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D48%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3Dpeppermint%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D26) that has had some editing to remove part of the serifs.

- Mike Yanega

I see. It does look it. Thanks Mike.

Riz
